summary: Completed comprehensive testing of desktop download functionality for Windows and Mac platforms. All core features working correctly including API endpoints, ZIP file generation, frontend UI, and build instructions.
passed_tests: Windows desktop download API returns valid ZIP file (7770 bytes)
Mac desktop download API returns valid ZIP file (7759 bytes)
ZIP contents validation - all required files present (main.js, preload.js, package.json, README.md, build.sh)
Package.json contains correct build scripts (build:win, build:mac)
Windows download button visible and clickable with correct data-testid
Mac download button visible and clickable with correct data-testid
Download links point to correct API endpoints (/api/desktop/download)
Build instructions section visible with yarn commands
Desktop features section displays System Tray, Global Shortcuts, Auto Updates, Native Stealth
Proper content-type (application/zip) and filename headers in API responses
Frontend UI layout and styling working correctly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All desktop download API endpoints working perfectly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All download buttons and UI elements working correctly
